title: XFL Season Preview, Gambling & Fantasy Advice (Football 2/7)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports writer and budding football league expert Ben Kercheval to help preview the new XFL which kicks off on Saturday (1:30). Ben explains the latest iteration, breaking down top teams, players, rules and more. Then, Evan Silva from Establish the Run joins the podcast (27:45) to discuss the XFL from a DFS and fantasy perspective, highlighting how to approach building lineups for something we're still learning about.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
